name: site-professionnel
description: Projet site professionnel avec CV, parcours et comp√©tences.

scripts.minify-css-style: postcss css/style.css -o dist/style.css && postcss dist/style.css --use postcss-clean -o dist/style.min.css
scripts.minify-css-owl: postcss assets/css/owl.carousel.min.css -o dist/owl.carousel.css && postcss dist/owl.carousel.css --use postcss-clean -o dist/owl.carousel.min.css
scripts.minify-js: npx terser "assets/js/intlTelInput.js" -o "dist/intlTelInput.min.js" --compress --mangle && npx terser "js/scripts.js" -o "dist/scripts.min.js" --compress --mangle && npx terser "js/scripts-critical.js" -o "dist/scripts-critical.min.js" --compress --mangle && npx terser "js/scripts-non-critical.js" -o "dist/scripts-non-critical.min.js" --compress --mangle && npx terser "assets/js/owl.carousel.min.js" -o "dist/owl.carousel.min.js" --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css-style && npm run minify-css-owl && npm run minify-js
